alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 2:21AM MST until January 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, locally up to 14 inches in the upper Cottonwoods for areas north of Provo Canyon. For areas near and south of Provo Canyon, 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting in excess of 40 mph, causing periods of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected. Traction laws may be enacted.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
